greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of e.g.f. log(1 + tan(x)).
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Kruchinin Vladimir Victorovich, Composition of ordinary generating functions, arXiv:1009.2565 [math.CO], 2010.
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} (-1)^(k+1) * evenp(n+k) * (-1)^((n+k)/2)/k * Sum_{j=k..n} j! * Stirling2(n, j) * 2^(n-j) * (-1)^(n+j-k) * binomial(j-1,k-1). [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, Aug 18 2010] [Corrected by _Petros Hadjicostas_, Jun 05 2020]
a(n) = Sum_{m=0..(n-1)/2} Sum_{j=0..2*m} binomial(j+n-2*m-1, n-2*m-1) * (j+n-2*m)! * 2^(2*m-j) * (-1)^(n-m+j-1) * Stirling2(n, j+n-2*m)/(n-2*m). [_Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jan 21 2012]
maple: seq(coeff(series( log(1 +tan(x)), x, n+1)*n!, x, n), n = 0..25); # _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 08 2020
mathematica: With[{nn = 30}, CoefficientList[Series[Log[1 + Tan[x]], {x, 0, nn}], x] Range[0, nn]!] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 11 2014 *)
program: (Maxima) a(n):=sum((-1)^(k+1)*if evenp(n+k) then (-1)^((n+k)/2)/k*sum(j!*stirling2(n,j)*2^(n-j)*(-1)^(n+j-k)*binomial(j-1,k-1),j,k,n) else 0,k,1,n);  /* _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Aug 18 2010 */ /* Corrected by _Petros Hadjicostas_, Jun 05 2020 */
(MAGMA) R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), 25); [0] cat Coefficients(R!(Laplace( Log(1 + Tan(x)) ))); // _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 08 2020
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_, _Simon Plouffe_
ext: Name corrected, more terms, _Joerg Arndt_, Sep 02 2013
